articles.content:

articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino sacked by Paris Saint-Germain
articles.description: Mauricio Pochettino has been sacked as Paris Saint-Germain manager just months after guiding the team to the league title.
articles.content:

articles.title: Chicago White Sox cancel postgame fireworks show after mass shooting at July 4 parade in Highland Park
articles.description: The White Sox canceled their postgame fireworks celebration on Monday in the wake of a mass shooting at an Independence Day parade in suburban Chicago that left at least six people dead and wounded 24 others.
